job_title: Systems Validation Engineer - Data Center Hardware
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBS Degree in engineering with minimum 4-8 years relevant work experienceExperience performing system testing: stress testing, performance testing, power and thermal testing, OS and driver compatibility testing, debug, etc.
• Experience with rack level testing: power and thermal testing, networking, rack management infrastructure testing, shock and vibe, etc.
• Experience using various stress tools and benchmarks to evaluate system behavior and identify patterns and test cases that rapidly expose design flaws.
• Ability to lift up to 50lb (required for system installation) with hands-on in the lab experience, preferably with lab environments at scale 100+ systems.
• In-depth, working knowledge of Linux kernel, Linux system functions and debugging (driver, firmware, OS configuration, etc), MacOS a plus.
• Install / de-install / repair / validate.
